=== 2006.04.02 == 0.3 ===
* Woops, accidentally left a dependency for scribe in, removed
* Switched to setuptools
* Made this an egg, depends on sprinkles 0.4.4+
* gvim is now installed as a plugin

=== 2006.03.31 == 0.2 ===
* Switched to Python. woot woot.
* Depends on 
* * zope.interface 3.0+ : http://www.python.org/pypi/zope.interface/
* * sprinkles 0.4+: http://an9.org/p/browser/sprinkles
* Now using .workspace instead of .saved_workspace
* Plugin system!
* First plugins:
* * Item section for the .workspace files
* * Gvim Items for the Item section (OS X only)


=== 2006.03.28 == 0.1.1 ===
* Uh... last minute change

=== 2006.03.28 == 0.1 ===
* Initial commit
